# authentik_policy_expiry (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create expiry policy

resource "authentik_policy_expiry" "name" {
  name = "expiry"
  days = 3
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `days` (Number)
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `deny_only` (Boolean) Defaults to `false`.
- `execution_logging` (Boolean) Defaults to `false`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `meta_app` (String) Defaults to `authentik_policies_expiry`. Generated.
- `meta_model` (String) Defaults to `passwordexpirypolicy`. Generated.
